name: Goku Drip RPG Deluxe Edition (feat. Ed from osu!ro)
name_original: Goku Drip RPG Deluxe Edition (feat. Ed from osu!ro)
description:
In a world ruled by DRIP you have to be the one to protect what really matters. It's a matter of doing what is right and looking really cool while doing it. Assemble a party of stylish heroes and conquer whatever evil awaits! A game made for RPG lovers from everywhere.

Features:

-DRIP

-classic RPG elements

-deep engaging story

-no joy-con drifting

-special deluxe edition with tons of new stuff

-complex adrenaline pumping boss fights

-Ed (from osu!ro)

This is my first project where multiple people were directly involved and so I would like to credit them properly here as well in case some of you don't make it to the end of the game.

Credits:

Creative Vision Supervisor: dripnugger (https://www.deviantart.com/dripnugger)

Programming: Mr.P1nk

Story: Mr.P1nk

Music: we don't own any of the music (except for the final track)

Ed sprite material: Ed (from osu!ro)

Special Thanks to: Bepis Sugar-Free the Second (for emotional support)

made with: ren'py (?)

Is a shitpost, don't take it seriously.
